page.title: 03HOME LIFE IN NANCLEDRA
page.content: Mrs.P.Berry,Cold Harbour Barn, Towednack.Representative of{ {professional people}who choose to live away from cities.Mr.P.Berry,{ {architect,lecturer}at Plymouth Polytechnic, part time. Bought barn four years ago.Rebuilding using old granite remortared.Two children,grown up,who spend quite a lot of the year at home.{Underfloor heating}by hot water pipes fuelled by wood burning stove.Family moved here from Yorkshire for health reasons.Interested in pottery,fired in japanese style raku. { Social life,}means mutual visiting with friends who have the same interests-drama reading photography pottery painting.Shopping done in bulk at Penzance deep freeze.Directly opposite cold harbour farm,now a guest house.Adjacent{old Methodist chapel} now a studio workshop.
